name: Raheem BROWN, Petitioner, v. Hon. Judge Benjamin LERNER, A.D.A. Steve Collier, Public Def. Byron Houston, Superintendent Gerald Rozum, Respondents

parties: Raheem BROWN, Petitioner, v. Hon. Judge Benjamin LERNER, A.D.A. Steve Collier, Public Def. Byron Houston, Superintendent Gerald Rozum, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 31st day of August, 2012, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus is DENIED. The Prothonotary is directed to strike the name of the jurist from the caption.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
52 A.3d 220
Raheem BROWN, Petitioner, v. Hon. Judge Benjamin LERNER, A.D.A. Steve Collier, Public Def. Byron Houston, Superintendent Gerald Rozum, Respondents.
No. 103 EM 2012.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 31, 2012.
